div.div: @NOTE: the money is also used as currency. So the player needs to obtain money to eat it (they just look like caloriemates) to keep hunger away, but it can also be usedÂ to buy items instead of talking to a traveler who is looking for a specific thing to trade.

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1st Trimester
First 30-150 Days
